articles.title: ESA's Gaia Spacecraft Hit By Micrometeoroid Strike And Solar Storm, Is Mission at Risk? - Times Now
articles.description: ESA's Gaia faced a micrometeoroid strike in April and a solar storm in May, causing damage and false detections. Engineers resolved these issues, allowing Gaia to resume its mission to map over a billion stars by the end of 2025.
